membership:
CEFS is a founding member of:  
- the Primary Food Processors (PFP) created in 2009 
www.pfp-eu.org 
 
CEFS is also member of: 
- FoodDrinkEurope (former CIAA: agro-food industries) 
 
 
CEFS launched in September 2015 the EU Beet sugar sustainability Partnership (EUBSSP) together with CIBE and EFFAT  
www.sustainablesugar.eu 
 
CEFS is also member of the EUBA: bioeconomy alliance
relevant_communication: merci de se référer au site web du CEFS qui sera modernisé en  2018
goals__remit:
CEFS is a completely non profit-making international organisation with a scientific object. CEFS is based in Brussels.  CEFS missions are:  
1- to carry-out studies relating to agricultural and technological problems connected with the sugar industry 
2- to examine questions concerning food and health 
3- to organise meetings of a scientific and/or technical nature 
4- to collect, to this effect, information of a statistical or documentary nature 
5- to provide the liaison between its members to ensure their representation in international bodies and institutions together with ther joint analysis and resolution of problems relating to the sugar industry in the techbnical, economic and legal fields.
